title: Game Development: Programming with Java Plus
description: Master the fundamentals of game engine architecture and object-oriented programming using Java to create immersive 2D and 3D experiences.

title: Medical Basics 101: Anatomy of the Human Body
description: A comprehensive introduction to human biology, focusing on organ systems, skeletal structure, and physiological functions for aspiring healthcare professionals.

title: Supervised Machine Learning: Regression and Classification
description: Learn to build and train predictive models using popular algorithms, including linear regression, logistic classification, and data visualization.

title: Product Design and Analysis: Physical Goods Creation
description: Explore the full lifecycle of product development from conceptual sketching to physical prototyping and market viability analysis.

title: Psychology and Consultation: Managing Anxiety
description: Understand the psychological roots of stress and anxiety while learning consultation techniques and modern therapeutic approaches.

title: Business Communication: Dealing with Clients
description: Develop essential communication skills for professional environments, including negotiation, presentations, and client relationship management.
